body.p:
Ervine Kentucky
June 25th 1864
Governor Bramlette
Dear Sir

Jo of Color the Slave of Mr Jones Finnell of Estill County convicted at the present Term of this court of an attempt to commit a rape upon Cornella Rankin an Infant under Ten years of age is an Ignorant Innofensive quiet Negro proved a good character up to the time of the time of the commission of this offinse and since that time, his owner Jones Finnell is one of the best Citizens of this County

While we believe the proof warranted a verdict by the Jury we do not believe that the negro knew at the time of the commission of the act to what extent he was violating the law, we would therefore ask you to exercise your pardoning power in his behalf

Your truly
H F Finley
Comths atty
Granville Pearl
Judge 7th & 12th dist of Ky
